Title: Arabic Library For WP7
Description:
This project provides a few features to support Arabic development on Windows Phone 7. 
1. Right-to-left controls.
2. Keyboard that is hooked to these controls.
3. Arabic engine that connects the letters and render them properly.
Code should be ported easily to other languages.
HomeWiki:
Arabic 4 WP7

This project provides controls for developing Arabic applications easily for Windows Phone 7.
It provides custom right-to-left controls that render arabic text properly and a keyboard that can be hooked to these controls to receive Arabic input.
It also includes some sample applications that use these controls.

If you want to contribute, please join. We need developers/testers!
